entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
